txt.en: '[placeholder], we are in need of your help. There have been many reports of brigands preying on citizens nearby and they need to be stopped.\n\n'I ask that you investigate the area the reports indicate and put an end to any brigands you encounter. Beware of their leader, Ulâmul the Talon, he is dangerous. But stopping him would bring some peace to these roads.'
Your mission is to investigate the area where there have been many reports of brigands and put a stop to them and their leader, Ulâmul the Talon.\n\nSpeak to Setokúli to travel.
Your mission is to investigate the area where there have been many reports of brigands and put a stop to them and their leader, Ulâmul the Talon.

'I am glad for your return.\n\n'I have heard of Ulâmul the Talon's defeat and I thank you for the information you gathered on where the attacks took place. Knowing where the brigands can hide and have been attacking from will help people to be better prepared during their travels.'
'[placeholder], your mission is to investigate the area where there have been many reports of brigands and put a stop to them and their leader, Ulâmul the Talon.'
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to investigate the area where there have been many reports of brigands and put a stop to them and their leader, Ulâmul the Talon.
Complete Mission: Clearing the Southern Road
